content:
Hey all,

I wondered if anyone might be able to point me to some information on the Baltimore Connectathon that was mentioned a few times yesterday? DocNetwork is very interested in sending some devs out to take part. Any tidbits appreciated.

Thanks!
You will also want to join the implementers channel here in Zulip and you should already be on the announcements channel
The main WGM doesn't give information about the sub-events yet (i don't think) but you should be able to start digging from there
Is there interest in having the Consent track at baltimore connectation? I have not yet heard of any interest, so have not yet put it into the list.
Is there any updates we should make to the track based on the MiHIN testing that I hear happened last month?
